## Created on: 2017-03-04

In this map, Marios have taken over the city center of Utrecht, The Netherlands. Can you find the one and only true Mario: Mario 1?

```{r leaflet, echo=FALSE}
set.seed(010203)

require(leaflet)
require(htmltools)

marioIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl =  "http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/ph03nyx/super-mario/256/Paper-Mario-icon.png",
  iconWidth = 256/8,
  iconHeight = 256/8,
  iconAnchorX = 1,
  iconAnchorY = 128/8
)
  
df <- data.frame(Names = paste("Mario", c(1:50)),
                 Lat = runif(50, min=52.0807, max = 52.0963),
                 Long = runif(50, min=5.0915, max = 5.1403))

df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(icon = marioIcon, popup = ~htmlEscape(Names))
```
